00002 #define QLZ_HEADER

00004 // Copyright (C) 2006-2008 Lasse Mikkel Reinhold
00005 // lar@quicklz.com

00009 // has been acquired (see http://www.quicklz.com/order.html). The commercial license 
00010 // does not cover derived or ported versions created by third parties under GPL.
00011 
00012 // You can edit following user settings. Note that data must be decompressed with the
00013 // same setting of QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL and QLZ_STREAMING_BUFFER as it was compressed
00014 // (see the manual). First #ifndef makes it possible to define settings from the outside 
00015 // like the compiler command line or from higher level code.
00016 
00017 #ifndef QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL
00018         #define QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL 1
00019         //#define QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL 2
00020         //#define QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL 3
00021 
00022         #define QLZ_STREAMING_BUFFER 0
00023         //#define QLZ_STREAMING_BUFFER 100000
00024         //#define QLZ_STREAMING_BUFFER 1000000
00025 
00026         //#define QLZ_MEMORY_SAFE
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 // Version 1.4.0 final (negative revision means beta)
00030 #define QLZ_VERSION_MAJOR 1
00031 #define QLZ_VERSION_MINOR 4
00032 #define QLZ_VERSION_REVISION 0
00033 
00034 // Using size_t, memset() and memcpy()
00035 #include <string.h>
00036 
00037 // Public functions of QuickLZ
00038 size_t qlz_size_decompressed(const char *source);
00039 size_t qlz_size_compressed(const char *source);
00040 size_t qlz_decompress(const char *source, void *destination, char *scratch_decompress);
00041 size_t qlz_compress(const void *source, char *destination, size_t size, char *scratch_compress);
00042 int qlz_get_setting(int setting);
00043 
00044 // Verify compression level
00045 #if QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL != 1 && QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL != 2 && QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL != 3
00046 #error QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL must be 1, 2 or 3
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 // Compute QLZ_SCRATCH_COMPRESS and QLZ_SCRATCH_DECOMPRESS
00050 #if QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 1
00051 #define QLZ_POINTERS 1
00052 #define QLZ_HASH_VALUES 4096
00053 #elif QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 2
00054 #define QLZ_POINTERS 4
00055 #define QLZ_HASH_VALUES 2048
00056 #elif QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 3
00057 #define QLZ_POINTERS 16
00058 #define QLZ_HASH_VALUES 4096
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 typedef struct 
00062 {
00063 #if QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 1
00064         unsigned int cache[QLZ_POINTERS];
00065 #endif
00066         const unsigned char *offset[QLZ_POINTERS];
00067 } qlz_hash_compress;
00068 
00069 typedef struct 
00070 {
00071         const unsigned char *offset[QLZ_POINTERS];
00072 } qlz_hash_decompress;
00073 
00074 
00075 #define QLZ_ALIGNMENT_PADD 8
00076 #define QLZ_BUFFER_COUNTER 8
00077 
00078 #define QLZ_SCRATCH_COMPRESS QLZ_ALIGNMENT_PADD + QLZ_BUFFER_COUNTER + QLZ_STREAMING_BUFFER + sizeof(qlz_hash_compress[QLZ_HASH_VALUES]) + QLZ_HASH_VALUES
00079 
00080 #if QLZ_COMPRESSION_LEVEL < 3
00081         #define QLZ_SCRATCH_DECOMPRESS QLZ_ALIGNMENT_PADD + QLZ_BUFFER_COUNTER + QLZ_STREAMING_BUFFER + sizeof(qlz_hash_decompress[QLZ_HASH_VALUES]) + QLZ_HASH_VALUES
00082 #else
00083         #define QLZ_SCRATCH_DECOMPRESS QLZ_ALIGNMENT_PADD + QLZ_BUFFER_COUNTER + QLZ_STREAMING_BUFFER
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 #endif
